name: PVP
description: 1B token capped supply, PVP is a token where you can join the Telegram group and connect and verify your wallet and play Telegram games with other players through a Telegram bot to try to win tokens. 90% of the tokens for each pot go towards the winning player for each game, with 10% of the tokens going towards a revenue sharing wallet, which will be distributed to holders and users alike every period that team will determine. 4% buy and sell tax through the Uniswap pool allows for Ethereum to be generated in order to support the gas-intensive Telegram game transactions. The purpose is to create a fun community where players can play fun games for prizes and also receive revenue share for their participation in the channel.
